liber.lang34: to bring peace to your clan

liber.lang37: to save world gnawing through the war

liber.lang39: to go in search of adventure

liber.lang49: Animated by a thirst for knowledge

liber.lang63: Lexrung, you are a free and independent spirit.
liber.lang64: Lexegar, you are an altruistic and you feel forced to help his neighbor.
liber.lang65: Lexerha, you are peaceful and prefer to find non -blessed solutions to conflicts.
liber.lang66: Lexas, you are of nature reflect and calm, their advice is always said wisely.
liber.lang67: Lexweqi, you are a brilliant hunter, you can easily track their prey.
liber.lang68: Lexaly, you are lively and you react quickly in all circumstances.
liber.lang69: Lexoulha, you are very social who likes to enjoy the pleasures of life.
liber.lang70: Lexora, you have a great will to accomplish things, you are tentu and determined.
liber.lang71: Lexauch, you are superstitious, you like to get back to Hazard and luck.
liber.lang72: Lexaxas, you are nervous and often angry. You often choose violence to solve problems.
liber.lang73: Lexang, you are a good craftsman, you have great ease in the creation of objects of all kinds.
liber.lang74: Lexug, you are resentful, you do not forget the evil that has been done to them and do not hesitate to make it pay.
liber.lang75: Lexoelia, you easily trust others, fraternity is one of their great value.
liber.lang76: Lexaug you are protective with members of your family and your home.
liber.title1: +20% in agility as long as we do not wear armor
liber.title2: allows you to create 1d4 potions per day
liber.title3: Allows you not to have a penalty for the use of two weapons
liber.title4: At 5 additional point of skill to level up
liber.title5: Allows you to have a magic weapon that strikes on the mind (damage 1D6+2), without a shrink, hide in a jewel
liber.title6: Allows you to have an additional action per turn with penalty of -20
liber.title7: Allows you to have 5 additional psyche
liber.title8: Find what is looking in a book / library (without jet of), +20 in memory jet
liber.title9: When you sleep recovering you 6 PV and 3 shrinks
liber.title10: Relaunch a missed jet of luck (once per jet), a successful automatic per day
liber.title11: allows you not to have a rush jet by fighting from a frame
liber.title12: allows an attack after a defense jet
liber.title13: PV can be used as the shrink without penalty.
liber.title14: Allows you to have a supplementary parade per turn
liber.title15: allows you to create 1d4 bombs per day
liber.title16: allows you to create 1d4 poison per day
liber.title17: Relaunch an observation jet (once per jet), finds more object on the bodies
liber.title19: allows you to repair weapons and armor and make it, with necessary materials.
liber.title20: The player can relaunch 2 initiative jet and keep the best
liber.title21: Immunize to diseases and poison, magic damage suffered divide by two.
liber.title22: Allows you to flee the fight without making a jet of physics, faster leak. +20 in dodge.
liber.title23: The dams with a naked hand, 1d6 melted instead of 1d4
liber.title24: Allows you to have an additional spell
liber.title26: All enemy engaged in combat with the player, and wanting to move or flee, can undergo an additional attack
liber.title27: Relaunch to launch a failed social jet (once per jet)
liber.title28: allows you to do a perception test on mind to detect all magic disturbance (magic trap, parchment, mage)
liber.title29: Allows you to be silent in these trips
liber.title30: Allows you to pierce with armor when it will not be detected
liber.title31: Augments the care capacity of 2 points
liber.title32: Give a 20% bonus for all sly jets, treated, attack in the back etc ...
liber.title33: Increases the care or damage effect +2 (in one of the 15 elements)
liber.title34: Allows you to have an additional damage on a weapon of your choice
liber.title35: When the player comes to lose consciousness, he returns to him with 1pv, (once a day)
liber.title36: allows you not to have a penalty if you shoot by far
liber.title37: The player can relaunch a missed jet of fear
liber.title38: Allows you to have 5 additional PV
liber.title41: -5 jurisdiction points at the level up
liber.title44: Carrying a disease, loses 1D4 PV per day if not taking its treatment. Magic damage multiply by 2
liber.title45: The player can relaunch 2 initiative jet and keep the worst
liber.title46: Relaunch a successful luck (once per jet), an automatic failure per day
liber.title51: Leaves the fight if you undergo the loss of more than half of your PV
liber.title52: is automatically spotted during his displacements, triggers the traps
liber.title53: -5pv at the start of the game
liber.title54: Your Alliers do not recover a PV and shrink when you sleep.
liber.title55: Increases the critical failure of its 5%Alliers
liber.title56: cannot flee the fight. -20 dodge and parade.

liber.caract274: Convert the world to his faith
liber.caract279: Abblutophobia - fear of swimming. This phobia is more a fear of drowning than fear of water.
liber.caract280: Acarophobia - fear of skin parasites, mites.
liber.caract281: Achluophobia - fear of darkness and black.
liber.caract282: Achmophobia / Aichmophobia - Fear of needles and pointed objects (scissors, knives, syringes for example).
liber.caract283: Acrophobia - fear of heights; is often accompanied by vertigo.
liber.caract284: Administrativophobia - fear of relations with administration and administrative letters.
liber.caract286: Aerodromophobia - fear of plane, plane trips.
liber.caract287: Aérophobie - Fear of air and wind.
liber.caract288: Agoraphobia - fear of public spaces and, by extension, crowd; more generally, spaces where flight is made difficult (crowds, but also deserted places).
liber.caract293: Anginophobia - fear of suffocation, especially by angina of chest.
liber.caract294: Angrophobia - fear of getting angry in public.
liber.caract297: Anthropophobia - fear of people or to be in their company, a form of social phobia.
liber.caract300: apopathodiaphulatophobia-fear of being constipated or constipation in itself.
liber.caract301: apopathophobia - fear of going to the saddle.
liber.caract306: Athazagoraphobia - fear of being forgotten or ignored.
liber.caract308: Automysophobia - fear of being dirty, of smelling bad.
liber.caract314: Blemmophobia - fear of the gaze of others.
liber.caract318: Cardiophobia - Fear of the heart or fear of the development of a cardiovascular disease.
liber.caract320: Catapedaphobia - fear of climbing in height.
liber.caract324: Climacophobia - fear of using stairs, especially to get them down.
liber.caract327: Cyclophobia - fear of getting on a bicycle or any other two -wheeled vehicle.
liber.caract329: dysmorphophobia / dysmorphophy - fear of physical anomalies.
liber.caract330: Ecclesiophobia - fear of the desired churches.
liber.caract333: ereutophobia (or erythrophobia) - fear of blushing in public.
liber.caract334: Fumiphobia - Fear of smoke (tobacco for example)
liber.caract335: Gephyrophobia - fear of bridges (or to cross the bridges).
liber.caract338: Glossophobia - fear of speaking in public.
liber.caract341: Halitophobia - fear of having bad breath.
liber.caract342: Hapophobia (or aphenphosmophobia) - fear of being touched.
liber.caract343: Hematophobia - fear of contact and the view of blood.
liber.caract346: Ithyphallophobia / Medorthophobia - fear of seeing erect penis.
liber.caract349: Kéraunophobia - Morbid fear of lightning and thunderstorms.
liber.caract350: Kopophobia-fear of being tired, or fatigue itself.
liber.caract351: Laxophobia - fear of being taken from imperative diarrhea in public, outside of home, and not to hold back.
liber.caract352: leukoselophobia - fear of the blank page (blocking of the writer).
liber.caract355: Megophobia-fear of large objects, large buildings (skyscraper or cruise ships for example)
liber.caract358: Mysophobia - fear of dirt, contamination by microbes.
liber.caract359: Nanopabulophobia - fear of Garden Dwarfs in Brouette.
liber.caract364: Nephrophobia - Fear of kidney disease (also lithophobia).
liber.caract366: Nevrophobia - fear of nerve attacks (also hysterophobia).
liber.caract368: Nomophobia - fear of being separated from his mobile phone. This phobia would also designate the excessive fear of laws.
liber.caract369: Nosocomephobia - Fear of hospitals, clinics and care centers in general.
liber.caract370: Nosophobia - fear of illness, to be sick.
liber.caract373: Nudophobia - fear or reprobation of human nudity.
liber.caract378: Odontophobia-Fear of the dental surgeon / medical or surgical acts in the mouth.
liber.caract379: Umbilicophobia - fear of the navel, cannot bear to touch it or see it
liber.caract384: phagophobia - fear of choking with food.
liber.caract386: Philophobia - fear of falling in love.
liber.caract389: Blood-Injection-Blessure phobia-Subtype of specific phobias classified in the DSM-IV.
liber.caract390: Social phobia - fear of social situations.
liber.caract391: Phobophobia - fear of being afraid (of being surprised).
liber.caract392: Pogonophobia - aversion to beards / phobia of the hair of the chin and the cheeks.
liber.caract397: Scopophobia - fear of the gaze of others.
liber.caract399: Siderodromophobia - Fear of traveling by train.
liber.caract402: Stasophobia - fear of having to stand.
liber.caract403: Taphophobia - fear of graves or to be buried alive.
liber.caract404: Telephoneophobia - fear of answering the phone.
liber.caract410: Trichophobia - fear of hairs and hair.
liber.caract416: Apiphobia - fear of bees; by extension, fear of insects with a dart or can sting.
liber.caract422: Heliciphobia - fear of snails and slugs.
liber.caract423: herpetophobia - fear of reptiles or amphibians.
liber.caract426: Musophobia - fear of mice or rats.
